greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of sum(1/Gamma(n/2), n>=1).
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..5000
formula: Equals (1+erf(1))*e+1/sqrt(Pi), where erf is the error function (see A099286).
results.author: _Bruno Berselli_, Mar 19 2013
